gst.data

Class ViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gst.data.ViewController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnnotationController, SignalController, ValueController

    public abstract class ViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for managing data access of SignalViews.
    Version:
    0.1 (18.07.2012)
    Author:
    Enrico Grunitz

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      protected double basetime
      measurement time of the first entry
      protected int channelCount
      number of channels of the entry

      protected UnisensDataset.EntryType type
      type of the controlled entry

      Constructs the controller object for the given entry.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract org.jfree.data.xy.XYSeriesCollection getDataPoints(double startTime, double endTime, int maxPoints)
      Returns an array of data points as double[2][x] where double[0][x] is the value and double[1][x] is the time.

      Gives the time in seconds of the last measured data point.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumChannels

        public int getNumChannels()
        Returns the number of channels of the controlled data.
        Returns:
        number of channels

      • isAnnotation

        public boolean isAnnotation()
        Retrns true if the controlled entry is annotation like.
        Returns:
        true if the data is annotation like, else false

      • getDataPoints

        public abstract org.jfree.data.xy.XYSeriesCollection getDataPoints(double startTime,
                                                 double endTime,
                                                 int maxPoints)
        Returns an array of data points as double[2][x] where double[0][x] is the value and double[1][x] is the time. All data points are between startTime and endTime.
        Parameters:
        startTime - beginning time
        endTime - ending time
        maxPoints - number of maximum data points
        Returns:
        the array of data points

      • getMaxX

        public abstract double getMaxX()
        Gives the time in seconds of the last measured data point.
        Returns:
        time in seconds

      • getMinX

        public abstract double getMinX()
        Gives the time in seconds of the first measured data point.
        Returns:
        time in seconds

      • getPhysicalUnit

        public abstract java.lang.String getPhysicalUnit()
        Returns the string that specifies the physical unit of the acquired variables.
        Returns:
        physical unit as String
